name: Buddy the Elf
ability: You start knowing who Kris Kringle is [+Kris Kringle]
firstNightReminder: Show the Kris Kringle charater token, them point to the player you know is Kris Kringle

name: Kris Kringle
ability: Each night, list (choose) three or more players. Tomorrow, when you check the list twice, find out how many selected players are evil. Then make another list.
firstNightReminder: Kris Kringle chooses three or more players, mark any chosen Evil players.
otherNightReminder: Give a finger signal to indicate how many previously chosen players are Evil. Kris Kringle chooses three or more new players.

name: Clarence Odbody
ability: Once per game announce that you wish to attempt a resurrection. If all Good players agree (hands raised), a player who died last night is resurrected
otherNightReminder: If there is a Resurrection Tonight, choose a player to be resurrected, then mark Clarence Odbody as having No Ability

name: Rudolph
ability: Each night*, learn how many players woke up (not including yourself).
otherNightReminder: Use a finger signal to show how many players woke up

name: Kevin McCallister
ability: Once per game, if you publicly guess Harry and Marv, they die and the Demon is drunk until dawn

name: Mrs. Claus
ability: Each night*, choose two players (not yourself). If they choose anyone else tonight, you find out who.
otherNightReminder: Mrs. Clause chooses 2 players (not themselves). If they choose anyone else tonight, you find out who.

name: Billy Mack
ability: Once per game, publicly select a number of players up to the starting number of evil players, they are drunk until tomorrow dusk.

name: Jack Skellington
ability: Each night*, choose two players. If chosen, a Demon must choose to either attack Jack Skellington or the other chosen player.
otherNightReminder: Jack Skellington chooses 2 players. If chosen a Demon must choose to either attack Jack Skellington or the other chosen player.

name: Frosty the Snowman
ability: If Santa is alive, you cannot die.

name: Captain Bob Wallace
ability: Each night*, choose three players, if all agree, you learn one of their roles. If one disagrees, you are drunk.
otherNightReminder: Captain Bob Wallace chooses 3 players. Wake each chosen player individually, show THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU and the Captain Bob Wallace token. If all players nod Yes, Captain Bob Wallace learns one of their roles. If one or more players disagrees, Captain Bob Wallace is made drunk.

name: Santa Claus
ability: If you die at night, an alive good player becomes Santa Claus.
otherNightReminder: If you Santa Claus at night, an alive Good player becomes Santa Claus.

name: Santa's Little Helper
ability: Each night*, choose a player, if Santa Claus or a relative (Arthur, Mrs, Kris) is selected, they are protected from malfunction until dusk.
otherNightReminder: Santa's Little Helper chooses a player, if Santa Claus or a relative (Arthur, Mrs, Kris) is selected, they are protected from malfunction until dusk.

name: Arthur Christmas
ability: If you are nominated by an Evil player, the nominating player is drunk until dawn

name: Ghost of Christmas Past
ability: If you are executed, one Evil player who acted last night gets to act again tonight.
otherNightReminder: If the Ghost of Christmas Past is executed, one Evil player who acted last night gets to act again tonight.

name: Ghost of Christmas Present
ability: If you are executed, tonight each evil player who voted for you will see a character who also voted for you.
otherNightReminder: If the Ghost of Christmas Present is executed, tonight each evil player who voted for Ghost of Christmas Present will see a character who also voted for Ghost of Christmas Present.

name: Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come
ability: If you are executed, a townsfolk who voted for you is drunk for the rest of the game
otherNightReminder: If you are executed, a townsfolk who voted for you is drunk for the rest of the game

name: Scrooge
ability: If one of the Ghosts activates, their ability activates twice. If you are executed a townsfolk turns evil tonight
otherNightReminder: If Scrooge was executed a townsfolk turns Evil tonight. If one of the Ghosts activated, their ability activates twice.

name: Jack Frost
ability: Each night, choose a player, they are frozen and do not wake tonight and cannot use their ability tomorrow day
firstNightReminder: Choose a player, mark the player as frozen
otherNightReminder: Jack Frost chooses a player, mark the chosen player as Frozen

name: Harry and Marv
ability: Once per game, if you publicly guess Kevin McCallister, you cannot be executed today and choose a player to die tonight
otherNightReminder: If Kevin was correctly guessed, choose a player to die

name: Lock, Shock and Barrel
ability: Each night, choose a player, if they are Santa or a relative (Arthur, Mrs, Kris), they are mad about being a different townsfolk or they might be executed.
firstNightReminder: Choose a player, mark the player as mad if they are Santa or a relative. Inform the player if they are mad.
otherNightReminder: Choose a player, mark the player as mad if they are Santa or a relative. Inform the player if they are mad.

name: Gremlin
ability: Each day, if the word 'gremlin' was said publicly, or you were selected or nominated by a good player, mark the Gremlin with the Activated token. At night, if Activated, you choose a player to die the following night.
otherNightReminder: If a player is marked with Dies Tonight, they die. If Activated wake the Gremlin and choose a player to die the following night.

name: The Grinch
ability: Each night, choose a player, they are drunk and you have their ability until dusk, then they die
firstNightReminder: Choose a player, mark the player as Grinched
otherNightReminder: Choose a player, mark the player as Grinched

name: The Krampus
ability: Each night*, if a good player died since you last acted, choose a player, they die
otherNightReminder: If a good player died since you last acted, choose a player, mark the player as dead

name: Mr. Oogie Boogie
ability: Each night*, choose a player, they die. On the 1st night, choose a minion. If you die, they become Mr Oogie Boogie.
firstNightReminder: Choose a minion, mark the minion as Mr Oogie Boogie's backup
otherNightReminder: Choose a player, mark the player as dead

name: Hans Gruber
ability: Each night*, choose whether to register as townsfolk or as a demon. You may choose a player to die on nights where you choose to register as a demon.
otherNightReminder: Choose whether to register as townsfolk or as a demon
